original_text: ‘Do not say to yourself either, “Someone will have to go down into the world below.” ’ (That means: ‘Someone will have to bring Christ up from the place where dead people are.’)
korean_text: 혹은 누가 무저갱에 내려가겠느냐 하지 말라 하니 내려가겠느냐 함은 그리스도를 죽은 자 가운데서 모셔 올리려는 것이라

sentences.original_text: Do not say to yourself either
Someone will have to go down
Someone will have to bring Christ up
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 그리스도를 데려 올라와야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the place where dead people are
